channel.title: The Broken Egg on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in The Broken Egg on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: a2b3 lunch non-summary for the Broken Egg
item.description: Lunch at The Broken Egg with the a2b3 crew. We had 17 people show up, which is about 2x what had been the normal attendance. The restaurant was very accomodating, and everyone was well fed. Organizing lunch is the highlight of my week. Lots of things were discussed, here’s a few of them: The Perseid meteor shower peaked last night, notes Linda Diane Feldt, who saw a few shooting stars from her cabin in Lyndon Township.
